I agree to all Terms & Conditions
Shop directly on any Indian sites and get it delivered to your ShoppRe Virtual Address. We\'ll receive your package & ship it to anywhere across the globe
Please Note that the shipping rates for Liquid/ Semi-Liquid products are higher. Check our Shipping Price Calculator for estimate pricing.
If you don\'t have an Indian Credit/Debit Card for payment or Indian Mobile Number to register on Shopping websites, we’ll shop on your behalf & ship it to you!
You’ve selected 1 item for Return
You’ve selected 1 item for Discard
You’ve selected 1 item for Split
You’ve selected 1 item for Exchange
The sender will pick up the package directly from the ShoppRe facility.\n \nFree for 3 days of item reaching your locker, you’ll be charged ₹50/item each day thereafter
Shoppre has to return the package for you to the sender.\n \nA shipment will be created and you’ll be charged as per the domestic shipping rates which will be notified via email.
Add the address provided by the eCommerce where the product needs to be returned.\n \nDomestic Shipping Charges will be applied based on the weight of your package

Do you want to select more?
We usually don’t place orders on this website. Please go through return/refund policies before placing your order. If you trust this website, we’ll still place this order on your behalf.
Looks like you are ordering from an e-Pharmacy. Click here to read medicine related shipping guidelines before placing your order.
Choose Packages for Shipment
The Total Value of your shipment is above ₹ 50,000. You need to pay additional charges to ship it.

1 of the packages selected does not have an invoice.
It is mandatory to attach invoice for all shipments as per customs regulations.
Shipping Preference
Get VIP treatment by pushing your packages ahead in the shipment queue. Faster Consolidation, Special Requests & Out the Door quickly!
Ship Request Summary
Airport Rd - Garhoud - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
Your order was successfully placed.\nWe’ll accept the package for you.
Your shipment request is in queue. We’ll notify you once your packages are ready to be shipped.

We’ll share the payment link once your packages
 are ready to be shipped.

 Please make the payment within 7 days of recieving the link.
 There will be a storage fee of INR 100/day after the 7th day.
The shipment cannot be processed without invoices for all the packages. Please upload the invoice to avoid any delays in shipment. You can cancel your order within one hour of creating shipment.
We’re processing your shipment request.\nYou will receive the payment link shortly.
Please make the payment within 7 days of initiation after which there’ll be a charge of ₹ 100/day. The charges will be added to the wallet.
Orders more than 15 items per website will incur an additional service fees of INR 50 per item
